title: Leading in ICT Service Exports
description: In 2023, Israel's ICT service exports accounted for 61.77% of its total service exports, marking the highest percentage globally.

title: Top Investor in Research and Development
description: In 2022, Israel dedicated 6.02% of its GDP to research and development, the highest proportion worldwide.

title: Universal Female Secondary Education Enrollment
description: As of 2015, Israel achieved a 100% net enrollment rate for females in secondary education, leading globally.

title: Low Male Mortality from Non-Communicable Diseases
description: In 2021, the mortality rate for Israeli males aged 30 to 70 from CVD, cancer, diabetes, or CRD was 8.9%, one of the lowest rates globally.
